trans-unit.source: Binds a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> to the event handlers that implement the command.
trans-unit.target: Associa um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"> </xref> para os processadores de eventos que implementem o comando.

trans-unit.source: A CommandBinding associates a command with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> events which implement and determine the status of the command.
trans-unit.target: Um CommandBinding associa um comando com o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> eventos que implementam e determinam o estado do comando.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method of a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> events are raised on the command target.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>método de um <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>denomina-se, o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> eventos são gerados no destino do comando.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the command target has a CommandBinding for the command, the appropriate handlers are called.
trans-unit.target: Se o destino do comando tem um CommandBinding para o comando, são denominados os processadores adequados.

trans-unit.source: If the command target does not have a CommandBinding for the command, the events are routed through the element tree until an element that has a CommandBinding is found.
trans-unit.target: Se o destino de comando não tem um CommandBinding para o comando, os eventos são encaminhados através da árvore de elemento até é encontrado um elemento que tenha um CommandBinding.

trans-unit.source: A CommandBinding has limited use with an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> that is not a<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: Um CommandBinding limitou utilização com um <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>que não um<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: This is because a CommandBinding binds the command to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> which listen to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> routed events which are raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> are called.
trans-unit.target: Isto acontece porque uma CommandBinding vincula o comando para o <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler>que escutam a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute>os eventos que são encaminhados é desencadeado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>método do <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>são denominados.</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> class by using the specified <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"> </xref> classe utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> especificado

trans-unit.source: The command to base the new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> on.
trans-unit.target: O comando para basear o novo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"> </xref> no.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> class by using the specified <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> and the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed"></xref> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"> </xref> classe utilizando especificado <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>e especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed"> </xref> processador de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: The command to base the new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> on.
trans-unit.target: O comando para basear o novo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"> </xref> no.

trans-unit.source: The handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed"></xref> event on the new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O processador para o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed"> </xref> eventos no novo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> class by using the specified <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> and the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute"></xref> event handlers.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"> </xref> classe utilizando especificado <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>e especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute"> </xref> processadores de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: The command to base the new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> on.
trans-unit.target: O comando para basear o novo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"> </xref> no.

trans-unit.source: The handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed"></xref> event on the new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O processador para o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed"> </xref> eventos no novo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute"></xref> event on the new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O processador para o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute"> </xref> eventos no novo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the command associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> initiates a check to determine whether the command can be executed on the command target.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o comando associada a este <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"> </xref> inicia uma verificação para determinar se o comando pode ser executado no destino do comando.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method on a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute> event is raised on the command target.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>método num <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>denomina-se, o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute>o evento é gerado no destino do comando.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the event is not handled, the CanExecute event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se o evento não é processado, o evento de CanExecute é gerado.

trans-unit.source: If the command target has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the command, the CanExecute handler for that <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is called.
trans-unit.target: Se o comando de destino tem um <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>para o comando, para que o processador de CanExecute <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: If the command target does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the command, the CanExecute event bubbles up the element tree searching for an element that has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> associated with the command.
trans-unit.target: Se o destino de comando não tem um <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>para o comando, bolhas de eventos CanExecute até a árvore de elemento procurar um elemento que tenha um <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>associado ao comando.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>associada a este <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: The command associated with this binding.
trans-unit.target: O comando associado a este enlace.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the command associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> executes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o comando associada a este <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"> </xref> executa.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> executes, it raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted> event on the command target.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>executa, gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>eventos no destino do comando.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted> event is not handled, the Executed event is raised on the command target.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>evento não está a ser processado, o evento de executados é gerado no destino do comando.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>

trans-unit.source: If the command target has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the specific command, the Executed handler for that <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is called.
trans-unit.target: Se o comando de destino tem um <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>para o comando específico, para que o processador de executados <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: If the command target does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for that specific command the Executed event bubbles up the element tree searching for an element that has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> associated with the command.
trans-unit.target: Se o destino de comando não tem um <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>para esse comando específico do evento executados bolhas cima na árvore de elemento procurar um elemento que tenha um <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>associado ao comando.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is not found, the command is not handled.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>não for encontrado, o comando não é processado.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the command associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> initiates a check to determine whether the command can be executed on the current command target.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o comando associada a este <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"> </xref> inicia uma verificação para determinar se o comando pode ser executado no destino do comando atual.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method on a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is called, the PreviewCanExecute event is raised on the command target if the command target has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the command.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>método num <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>é chamado PreviewCanExecute o evento é gerado no destino do comando, se o comando de destino tem um <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>para o comando.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> handler for that <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is called.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>processador para que <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>

trans-unit.source: If the command target does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the command, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> event bubbles up the element tree searching for an element that has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> associated with the command.
trans-unit.target: Se o destino de comando não tem um <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>para o comando, o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>bolhas de eventos de segurança a árvore de elemento procurar um elemento que tenha um <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>associado ao comando.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: If the event is not handled, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se o evento não é processado, o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>o evento é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Tunneling| |Delegate|| - The corresponding bubbling event is .

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the command associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> executes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o comando associada a este <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"> </xref> executa.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> executes, it raises the PreviewExecuted event on the command target.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>executa, gera o evento de PreviewExecuted no destino do comando.</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>

trans-unit.source: If the command target has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the command the PreviewExecuted handler for that <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is called.
trans-unit.target: Se o comando de destino tem um <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>para o comando de PreviewExecuted processador para que <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: If the command target does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the command the PreviewExecuted event tunnels down the element tree searching for an element that has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> associated with the command.
trans-unit.target: Se o destino de comando não tem um <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>para o comando túneis de evento PreviewExecuted pendente a árvore de elemento procurar um elemento que tenha um <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>associado ao comando.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: If the preview event is not handled, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> event is raised on command target.
trans-unit.target: Se o evento de pré-visualização não é processado, o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed>o evento é gerado no destino de comando.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed>
